artist: Delineator: After Charles Eisen; Engraver: Étienne Ficquet
description: bust length portrait facing right and looking back to the left; within an oval shield sheaped cartouche with portraits on either side; portrait on left soldier in armor, on right figure wearing crown
inscription:
Signature, Title and, Inscription

on sheet below image in black: C.Eisen del   Ficquet sculp. / JACQUES / VAILLANT / ELEVEDE SON FRERE / WALLERANT VAILLANT : on sheet in pencil 2-501
title: Portrait of Jacques Vaillant
